Title: - Threatening - the rhetoric of the Russian Federation about nuclear weapons begins to lose its mean...
Description: This opinion was expressed by the head of the Council of Reservists of the Armed Forces of Ukraine Ivan Tymochko on the air of Suspilnyi on September 28 , answering the presenter's question about how much Ukrainians should be afraid of such statements. -Now Russian rhetoric is beginning to lose its meaning and threatening color after a non-nuclear country (Ukraine) conducted a successful military operation on the territory of the nuclear state of the Russian Federation. I mean Kurshchyna. All theories and analyzes that were previously evaluated (and these were just theories, because after Hiroshima and Nagasaki there were no nuclear strikes on the territory of sovereign countries) were considered as such that a nuclear country would use at least tactical nuclear weapons. But, as we can see, they did not apply it, they did not know at all what to do with it,- commented Ivan Tymochko. He also recalled that the power of warehouse explosions in the Russian Toropts, according to various estimates, was approximately 30 kilotons. -And one tactical nuclear bomb is 10 kilotons. That is, roughly speaking, we will say that two full-fledged tactical nuclear bombs exploded there… And we understand that a nuclear bomb is also accompanied by a radioactive background, contamination of territories. What am I leading to? Such an effect of the impact as the Russians imposed (that, they say, radioactive ash everywhere) did not occur. The power of the explosion does not pose a threat. In addition, there are no such concentrations of armed forces in modern conditions of war, as it was during the Second World War: when brigades, divisions, million-strong armies advanced,- Ivan Tymochko recounted. He stressed that a tactical nuclear strike on a military compound would have -very little effect.- -At the very least, it certainly won't change the course of events in specific directions, but it will cause a flurry of negativity. Apply to the civilian population? We understand that this will be the reaction of all nuclear countries, including China.- Ivan Tymochko reminded that China is one of the opponents of Russia's use of nuclear weapons. As reported by ArmyInform, all the statements of Vladimir Putin and Alexander Lukashenka about nuclear weapons -i-putina-pro-yadernu-zbroyu/->should be considered as a -single network of information campaign-.

Title: - Hit your own! - the Russians hit their own soldiers who were going to surrender
Description: The video of another war crime by the occupiers was released on September 28 on the brigade's channel. During another assault in the Kurakhiv direction, the brigade, as well as neighbors on the flanks, stopped a convoy of enemy vehicles. The group of invaders was able to land in the landing, but after some time decided to surrender. Our drone accompanied her. But on the way, the occupiers killed their own. -Seven of them got off the landing. Just a catch. As soon as the pilots began to withdraw from the invaders, the Russian army conducted a valiant attack. On their own. A few were cut down well - not all of them fell into the good hands of our brigade,- the soldiers of the 33rd brigade commented on the impressive video. As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the 33rd mechanized brigade showed how the operators of the anti-tank missile complex -Stugna- hit several units at once enemy armored vehicles.

Title: Out of shit and sticks, our stormtroopers unpacked the enemy FPV drone
Description: The video with the dissection of the FPV drone was released on September 28 on the battalion channel. The drone's ammunition was made from a pipe filled with explosives and metal balls wrapped in tape. -It's good that they do everything randomly, and this drone, the combat part of which is assembled from what -grandfather had in the garage-, just fell at the entrance to the dugout. It is good that we are far ahead in this direction, and the problems we are solving are increasing the effectiveness of the warhead and creating different types of projectiles for different tasks, and not where to ``steal a pipe to make an impressive element''. - commented on the video in the group. At the same time, the fighters of -Black Swan- are urged not to relax. -This does not mean that victory is tomorrow. This realization says that we are on the right track, but there is still a lot of hard work ahead,- the stormtroopers noted. As ArmiyaInform reported, on Russian television the 225th Assault Battalion of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, which made another breakthrough at the border of the Russian Federation, called elite and equipped with -the best Western technique-.

Title: -Partisan- on the occupiers — the new artillery system hits more accurately -Grada-
Description: Photos of the -Partizan- combat test were published on the brigade's channel. -We developed it ourselves and with the help of volunteers. An expensive structure was welded for us, which was installed on a pickup truck. The pipes themselves, guides, were taken from the Russian trophy BM-21 -Grad-. Electronics were connected in the unit by themselves,- explains the jet battery commander Davyd. He controls the battle at the command post. The experience of working on the -Grady- allowed him to achieve the number of shots and the flight range of the projectile on the new installation. -The BM-21 has a long range - this is the principle of operation. With the new installation, we hit 4 out of 6 shells in the area of ​​the target. This is a good indicator. And the range was not affected at the same time - we work at the same distance as on ordinary -BMs-, – comments David. He noted that the firing was conducted deeper than the front edge of the landing, where the enemy's UAV calculations were hidden, which constantly harass the infantry with drops. The platoon commander Oleksandr, who directs the fire at the firing position, is happy: the machine is much smaller than the -Grad-. Therefore, it is easier to disguise it. -We can get closer to the demarcation line. Do not drive the installation far into the waiting area. If the target does not require the work of a whole package, we worked out 6 shells or less, and there is no need to drive a whole big machine,- says Oleksandr. The division plans to -bring the installation to perfection- and start work on a second similar machine. As reported by ArmyInform, the operators of the Black Raven 93 strike drone battalion of the Kholodny Yar mechanized brigade hit Russian transport.

Title: Vandalism at the cemetery: In Ternopil Oblast, a man desecrated the graves of War Heroes
Description: About the National Police of Ukraine reported on September 27. -Employees of the Kremenets district police department received a message from the residents of the village of Mlynivtsi that an unknown man tore down state flags and threw crosses from the graves of servicemen at the local cemetery,- the National Police said in a statement. At the scene of the incident, law enforcement officers recorded 11 damaged graves of soldiers who died in the war, defending the independence and territorial integrity of Ukraine from the armed aggression of the Russian Federation. The police established the identity of the attacker. He turned out to be a 44-year-old resident of the Ternopil district. Law enforcement officers are investigating the motives of the crime. The issue of entering information on this fact into the Unified Register of Pre-Trial Investigations under Part No. 2 Art. 297 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine (insulting a grave, other place of burial). The article is punishable by up to five years in prison. -In the course of the pre-trial investigation, an appropriate examination will be ordered to establish the sanity of the person involved,- the police added. As ArmiyaInform wrote, in Kryvyi Rozi law enforcement officers opened criminal proceedingsregarding a local resident who, in a state of alcoholic intoxication, approached the Heroes' Memorial and committed hooligan acts.

Title: Magical! Guardsmen showed how 52 million rubles are burning
Description: The video of combat operation appeared on September 28 on the unit's channel. -52 million rubles turn into rubble in a few seconds. The T-72B3 tank, which should have been the pride of the Russian army, meets its fate at the hands of Ukrainian troops. An accurate shot, and armor no longer saves from justice. The cost of the tank is millions, and the lives of our people are priceless - this is not just destroyed equipment, it is another symbol of the indomitability of the Ukrainian people,- the unit commented on the video. As reported by ArmyInform, the fighters of the Privid Khortytsi unit of the 2nd battalion of the operational assignment of the 15th brigade -Kara-Dag- of the National Guard was removed injury of the occupier, who hid at a public transport stop, and then got on all fours and tried to escape like this.

Title: the Russians are already bombing — Dutch F-16s conducted their last flight in front of Ukraine
Description: On September 27 reported Minister of Defense of the Netherlands Ruben Breckelmans. -Significant event: the last farewell flight of the iconic F-16. After 45 years of faithful service and many missions, the aircraft will get a new life in Ukraine and Romania. To everyone who flew or serviced the F-16: thank you!-, wrote Ruben Breckelmans on the X social network. At the Ministry of Defense of the country reminded that the first of 213 F-16 fighters purchased by the Netherlands arrived at Leeuwarden air base on June 6 1979. The department also emphasized that the F-16 was replaced by the F-35 fighter. As ArmyInform wrote, the Netherlands plan to provide technical equipment for Ukrainian F -16, as well as air-to-air missiles, which the planes will be able to use to protect Ukrainian air space.

Title: The President concluded his week-long visit to America
Description: This was announced by the head of state on September 28. According to him, these were meetings with representatives of the USA, countries of the Global South, Europe, and international organizations. Separately - work with energy and defense companies. In particular, he listed the countries whose representatives he met during this visit: Great Britain, Vietnam, Guatemala, Denmark, India, Italy, Canada, Germany, Panama, Paraguay, South Africa, Slovenia, Turkey, Finland, France, Japan. And also: heads of the EU, NATO, UN, Organization of American States. -All for the sake of strengthening Ukraine's position and bringing a just peace closer.- Presented the Victory Plan to the partners. We are making joint efforts for reconstruction. And together we bring a just peace. Thank you to everyone who is with Ukraine,- the head of state summed up. As ArmyInform wrote, Volodymyr Zelensky told that the Ukrainian delegation presented the Victory Plan to the USA and now work will continue on filling in each point.

Title: -Soldier's path-: stories of the mobilization of Ukrainians gathered an audience of millions
Description: This is reported by the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. -The way of a soldier. Mobilization- is a reality project that looks behind the scenes of the mobilization process. It depicts the stories of three Ukrainians who decided to serve in the Armed Forces. During filming, the participants talked about difficulties, training, growth, facing the reality of war and going through all levels of training for service. Filming of the tape lasted for 2 months. The project was created with the assistance of the Ground Forces Command of the Armed Forces of Ukraine and the Main Directorate of Communications of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. Borys Chekmaryov, nicknamed -The Philosopher-, half-jokingly calls himself -the face of mobilization- after participating in the project. Boris perceived the project as a challenge he set for himself. Commenting on his participation, he gave valuable advice to future military personnel: -It is worth remembering that the war for freedom begins with one's own head and its first opponent is fear. Therefore, I would like people to know that being afraid is one of the least effective ways of dealing with fear, as only you learn to manage it, your service will become much clearer to you and you will have more influence on it.- Chekmaryov also added that there were cases when strangers who saw the project approached him to mobilize to the unit where he was serving. The project started on the My-Ukraine+ channel on August 4. During the 7 weeks of the show, 1 million viewers in cities with a population of over 50,000 were contacted by the project's episodes on the TV channel. In general, together with cities with a population of less than 50 thousand and digital platforms of the channel, the project gathered more than 2 million viewers. You can also watch all episodes on the YouTube channel of the My-Ukraine+ TV channel. As reported by ArmyInform, in the Museum of History of Kyiv opening of the exhibition project -ΩΜΟΦΌΡΙΟ. The army under the protection of the Mother of God-.

Title: The city that holds on - the ruins of Toretsk from a bird's eye view
Description: Video from the city appeared on September 28 on the brigade channel. -Hundreds of projectiles and mines, dozens of aerial bombs, an endless number of FPV drones release weapons around the city every day. Our RAGE grows stronger every day. We are fighting. We will win!-, - commented on the video in -Luta-. As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the special operations battalion -Enea- of the National Police brigade -Lyut- attacked enemy positions in one of the high-rise buildings of Toretsk in Donetsk region.

Title: Our platoon captured four Russians, another eight enemies were killed - Lviv paratroopers about batt...
Description: The material was distributed by the press service of the military unit. Kostyantyn, a platoon commander of one of the airborne assault companies of the 80th Infantry Division, and Serhiy, an assault pilot, recall the first hours of fighting on enemy territory. -To be honest, we have been waiting for this breakthrough for a long time. It is somewhat similar to the liberation of Kharkiv Oblast in 2022. We have long been waiting for such an opportunity to show the enemy our strength and power,- says platoon commander Konstantin. According to the officer, the tasks were varied. -We had several combat fronts at once. One of them is to go as far as possible, deep into the enemy's positions, to clear the territory for a further offensive. On August 7, our platoon captured four Russians, and another eight enemies were killed. We provided medical assistance to one of the wounded on the spot, and in this way even saved his life,- recalls Kostyantyn. Stormtrooper Serhii says about the beginning of the offensive. -The first day was quite busy. They captured the occupiers, took away their weapons, fed them, and warmed them. Mostly, these were young guys, conscripts. One of them, the poor man, even burst into tears and was happy that he was captured,- says Serhiy. And platoon commander Konstantin recalls that while they were advancing to their position, the enemy met them with fire. -Our Bushmaster was hit with an RPG. The car even rolled back and thus managed to save the soldiers, -Bushmaster- is a super car. The boys saved themselves and took more advantageous positions. Then they captured enemy mortar positions, equipment, enemy vehicles,- says the officer. The paratroopers expect enemy losses from this operation: territory, personnel, reserve and ammunition. Purpose: to make it easier for the military in other directions. -With each success, the boys are gaining more and more strength, zeal and desire. We are doing our job and we are ready to continue doing it for all Ukrainians and for our future,- says Kostyantyn about the motivation of his brothers. Earlier, as ArmyInform wrote, fighters of the 22nd separate mechanized brigade of the Ground Forces told about the first clashes with the enemy in Kurshchyna, in particular, how they managed to take 28 prisoners and destroy the DRG with one shot.

Title: The Russians disguised their cannon with a fence and a doghouse. It didn't help
Description: The video of the combat operation was published on the -Birds of Magyar- channel. Enemy tanks, self-propelled guns hiding in the hangar and several more conventional guns were also hit. Attention was also paid to the personnel of the enemy. One of the occupiers, in order to hide from the drone, crawled under a bush where his comrade was already hiding. This greatly facilitated the work of our pilots. The FPV drone hit the Russians directly, which significantly damaged their bodily integrity. -That's what I call -the birds scattered on the branches-! And complete silence,- Captain Robert Brovdi, commander of -Birds of Magyar-, commented on the hit. As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the 414th unmanned battalion aviation systems as part of the Marine Corps in September have already destroyed 100 Russian guns .

Title: The enemy again began to attack the most in the Pokrovsky direction - the General Staff of the Armed...
Description: Operational information as of 16.00 on September 28 was published by the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. The enemy does not stop trying to advance deep into the territory of Ukraine. The defense forces restrain the invaders, causing them significant losses. The border areas of Sumy Oblast continue to suffer from Russian airstrikes. In particular, terrorists hit the areas of Kucherivka, Bilokopytovo, Studenko and Yunakivka with guided aerial bombs, dropping 20 self-propelled grenade launchers. A number of settlements in Chernihiv, Sumy, and Kharkiv regions were hit by the shelling of the terrorist army today, including Bachivsk, Yizdetske, Baranivka, Pokrovka, Myropyllya, Shalymivka, Porozok, Boyaro-Lezhachi, Vidrodenivske, Timofiivka, Yanzhulivka, and Mykhailove. The enemy also carried out ten airstrikes, using 14 air defense systems in the Kursk region. In the Kharkiv direction, the occupiers stormed the positions of our units in the Tykh region. The situation is under control. Also, the enemy hit Shypuvaty in the Kharkiv region with two aerial bombs. The enemy attacked our positions in the Kupyan direction four times. Ukrainian defenders repelled enemy assaults near Synkivka and Lozova. A battle continues near Tabaivka. The enemy is actively using bomber aircraft in the direction, and has already dropped 14 aerial bombs today. In the Lyman direction, enemy units attacked in the areas of Grekivka, Nevsky, Makiivka, Terniv, Torsky, and Bilogorivka. Since the beginning of the day, Ukrainian soldiers have already repelled eight attacks, and four battles are ongoing. The enemy did not carry out assaults in the Siversky direction. Airstrikes with five anti-aircraft missiles on Siversk. In the Kramatorsk direction, the invaders carried out five assaults near Kalynyvka, Chasovoy Yar and Kurdyumivka. There are currently four ongoing attacks by the occupiers. In the Toretsk direction, Ukrainian defenders repel enemy attacks in the Toretsk, Shcherbinivka and Nelipivka districts. At this time, the largest number of clashes was recorded in the Pokrovsky direction. Thus, since the beginning of the day, the occupiers have already made 24 attempts to dislodge our defenders from their occupied positions in the areas of seven different settlements. More than half of all clashes took place near Selidovoy and Mykolaivka. The defense forces, restraining the enemy onslaught, have repelled a total of 20 enemy attacks in the direction. Others continue. The enemy suffers significant losses in manpower. In the Kurakhiv direction, the invaders attacked our units six times, trying to advance in the areas of Tsukuryne, Georgiivka, and Katerynivka. Fighting continues near Tsukuriny. In the Vremivsk direction, the invaders carried out ten attacks on the positions of Ukrainian troops near Vugledar, Vodyanyi and Katerynivka. Six clashes are ongoing. In the Orihiv direction, the enemy is using assault aircraft, hitting the districts of Kamiansky and Novoandriivka. In the Dnieper direction, the enemy made one futile attempt to storm the positions of Ukrainian units. He struck Dutchany, Havrylivka and Sablukivka with guided air bombs, and Lviv was bombarded with unguided air rockets. As reported by ArmyInform, during the past day 180 combat clashes were recorded.

Title: In Kharkiv Oblast, a judge of the Supreme Court was killed by a Russian drone
Description: This was reported by the Kharkiv Regional Prosecutor's Office. It is also currently known about three injured women. According to preliminary data, they were also in this car. They were hospitalized. Under the procedural leadership of the Dergachy District Prosecutor's Office of the Kharkiv Region, a pre-trial investigation has been launched into the fact of violation of the laws and customs of war, combined with intentional murder (Part 2 of Article 438 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine). As reported by ArmyInform, a two-day mourning was announced in Sumy for the victims of the Russian strike.

Title: The Armed Forces commented on whether we should be afraid of Lukashenka's and Putin's statements abo...
Description: This opinion was expressed by the head of the Council of Reservists of the Armed Forces of Ukraine Ivan Tymochko on the air of Suspilnyi on September 28 , answering the presenter's question about how much Ukrainians should be afraid of such statements. -This is due to several points. First of all, all world intelligence says that it was not brought to Belarus as a nuclear weapon, but launchers and carriers. These are different things. The warhead itself is not nuclear there. The second point: Russia violated all international treaties when it violated the treaty on the non-proliferation of nuclear weapons, simply ceasing nuclear weapons to a non-nuclear country that at one time did not have this status. This means that the balance of power has been disturbed and now the world community is faced with the question: to remain silent or to strike a pre-emptive strike in order to somehow insure itself,- comments Ivan Tymochko. In addition, according to his words, Lukashenko understands that the situation in the country is far from stable. -And in order to mobilize his electorate, to create an external threat in order to reject an internal one, he starts talking about -some kind of nuclear strike,- Ivan Tymochko summarized. As ArmiyaInform wrote, at one time the DPSU informed that the situation was being instigated by Belarus continues mainly in the information field, both on the border with Ukraine and on the borders with the neighboring states of the European Union. The Belarusian army is not ready for an independent invasion, however, there are Russian troops on the territory of a country that is an ally of the Russian aggressors.

Title: He fought in the ring, now the Russian beats - the world kickboxing champion is now fighting in Done...
Description: Video from Roman appeared on September 28 on the channel of the operational command -North-. Now Roman is fighting for Ukraine's independence in the war with Russia in the ranks of the 110th brigade. -No one is born for war, but everyone's efforts are needed to end it. We are approaching victory side by side with the best!-, Roman declared and called to join the ranks of the Armed Forces. As reported by ArmyInform, drones from the unmanned systems battalion of the 110th mechanized brigade named after Corporal Mark Bezruchka noticed in time how one Russian tank tried to tow another.

Title: A two-day mourning for the victims of the Russian attack was announced in Sumy
Description: This was reported on September 28 by the Sumy City Council. As a sign of mourning for the dead, the State Flag of Ukraine will be flown at half-mast on administrative buildings, on buildings and structures of enterprises, institutions and organizations, regardless of the forms of ownership. On these days, it is forbidden to hold any entertainment events on the territory of the community and to play music in trade establishments, public catering and in public transport. As reported by ArmyInform, in Sumy as a result of a Russian attack on a hospital 9 people died.

Title: Without antennas, our drones destroy the enemy's technical means
Description: Video of the damage appeared on September 28 on the battalion channel. Enemy antennas were scattered on the roofs of houses, on poles, in bushes, but they were destroyed everywhere. -Antennas are an extremely important resource in modern warfare, so we find them and destroy them,- the battalion commented on the video. As reported by ArmyInform, drones from the unmanned systems battalion of the 110th mechanized brigade named after Colonel-General Mark Bezruchko was spotted by Russian -Urals- carrying ammunition to enemy positions, and struck them.

Title: Occupiers attacked a store in Donetsk region: at least two people died
Description: About this informs the head of Donetsk OVA Vadym Filashkin. According to him, the Russians hit the village this morning. The ammunition hit the store, as a result of which the 28-year-old saleswoman and her husband died from non-life-threatening injuries. A 41-year-old citizen also received shrapnel wounds. He was taken to the hospital. The final number of casualties and the type of weaponry are being determined. 4 private houses, a shop and 5 cars were damaged. The number of victims is likely to rise. The investigation of the scene is ongoing. As reported by ArmyInform, the enemy attacked a dense residential building in Dobropilly, seven people were injured.

Title: The occupiers are preparing to storm the South: where exactly the enemy plans to strike, the Armed F...
Description: Colonel Vladyslav Voloshyn, the spokesman of the -Tavria- OUV, told about this on the air of the national telethon -Yedini Novyni- . — The Russians are preparing for an assault today in the Zaporozhye direction. In particular, in the Priyutny region, according to our intelligence, the enemy is concentrating personnel who plan to use them in assaults, he said. The spokesman reminded that earlier in the OUV - Tavria- already reported that the Russian occupation forces in the South of Ukraine received 25 buggies from the reserve base of road transport of the southern district. This is the technique the invaders use during assaults by small groups of infantry. — These are signs of preparation for the fact that in the near future assault actions will be carried out in the Zaporizhzhia direction. In addition, on the front line, the enemy is already concentrating the personnel of the assault groups in advanced positions. Therefore, we will wait for the fact that the enemy will start to activate in this direction, the military officer said. The officer noted that the enemy will most likely try to improve their current tactical position to create conditions for larger-scale offensive operations. — Assaults will be carried out in order to improve their tactical position, move the configuration of the battle line to their advantage. Now the enemy wants to prepare just such assaults so that it will be comfortable for him to carry out offensive actions in the future, he said. So right now in the South it's all about preparing for assaults, not a full-scale offensive. Earlier, ArmyInform reported what the occupiers are doing on the territory of Zaporizhzhya NPP.

Title: GUR confirmed the destruction of the Russian shachedologist and even posted a photo
Description: This was reported by the Main Intelligence Directorate of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine on September 28. According to the GUR, 51-year-old Kolomeytsev managed the 924 state center (military unit 20924) of unmanned aviation of the Ministry of Defense of the Russian Federation, which trains specialists in the combat use of unmanned aerial vehicles, in particular -shaheeds-, as well as UAV maintenance personnel. The occupier is directly involved in the full-scale invasion of Russia and the commission of war crimes against Ukraine. -There will be a fair retribution for every war crime,- I remind the HUR. As reported by ArmyInform, in Sumy as a result of a Russian attack by -shahedas- on a hospital 9 people died.

Title: Three more children of the Kherson Region were saved from the horrors of the occupation
Description: This was reported by the head of Kherson OVA Oleksandr Prokudin. Two children with special needs who, before the beginning of the large-scale invasion, were brought up in the Oleshkiv Children's Boarding Home. The occupiers took these children to Skadovsk and Russia. Thanks to the efforts of the Office of the Verkhovna Rada Commissioner for Human Rights, they were returned. Currently, the children are safe, receiving medical and psychological assistance. -I am grateful to everyone who is doing their best to save our children. Since the beginning of 2024, 206 children from the Kherson region have been returned to the controlled territory of Ukraine,- said Oleksandr Prokudin. As reported by ArmyInform, since the beginning of the year more than 200 children of the Kherson region were returned from the occupation.

Title: In Russia, they eliminated a colonel who was martyred
Description: This was reported by Army TV on September 28, citing its own sources. The liquidation of Kolomeitsev was the result of a special operation of the local movement of resistance to the Kremlin regime in coordination with the Main Directorate of Intelligence of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. It is noted that Oleksiy Kolomeytsev was involved in the training of Russian specialists in the use of UAVs, in particular operators and personnel of the Shahed-type kamikaze attack drones. As reported by ArmyInform, in 2.5 years of large-scale war several dozen mysterious explosions of cars of the Russian occupiers and collaborators took place.

Title: In Sumy, 9 people died as a result of a Russian attack on a hospital. Among them are a policeman and...
Description: This was reported by the State Emergency Service in the afternoon of September 28. In the morning, using UAVs of the Shahed type, the enemy attacked Sumy. As a result of the attack, the buildings of medical institutions suffered significant destruction and damage, and there were several sources of fire. After evacuating the people who were in the medical facility to a safe place and carrying out extinguishing, information was received about the threat of a second strike. The employees of the State Emergency Service managed to leave. This time, the enemy hit was near the epicenter of the event between two five-story residential buildings. Employees of the State Emergency Service evacuated the residents from the damaged residential buildings and eliminated the sources of combustion. Special equipment for high-altitude work was brought to the site of the impact. A 43-year-old policeman died at the scene of the impact. One of the dead in Sumy is a nurse, the Ministry of Health reported, adding that 19 victims are known. In the hospital, the reception department, the trauma center and the fourth floor were destroyed. As reported by ArmiyaInform, the rescue operation was completed in Kryvyi Rih: another body was unblocked from under the rubble.

Title: -My dream is to shoot down a Russian helicopter,- the operators of the Stugna-P ATGM told how they d...
Description: A video of a conversation with anti-tankers appeared on September 28 on the brigade's channel. -We hit the T-80 tank first. The guys installed a new rocket and we hit another -zushka-. Thus, the assault was stopped,- Andrii, the commander of the unit, said. According to him, teamwork is very important, it is the only way to achieve success. And you have to be able to wait. -It's like fishing: you cast a fishing rod, you wait, and then it bites and you work, and with pleasure,- says Andriy. See more about defeating enemy equipment and motivation in the video:   /09/27/na-harkivshhyni-znyshhyly-ridkisnu-rosijsku-garmatu/->struck the Russian self-propelled 2C5 -Hyacinth-S-.

Title: The enemy mercilessly attacks the suburbs of Kherson: six people were injured
Description: This is reported by Kherson OVA. In particular, a 23-year-old woman received a mine-explosive injury. She is being monitored. An 85-year-old woman suffered shrapnel wounds to the chest, abdomen and thigh. She is in serious condition. A 56-year-old woman has injuries to her legs and forearm. Another woman, 42, was hospitalized with shrapnel wounds to her forearm and thigh. As a result of dropping explosives from a drone, a 68-year-old man received shrapnel wounds to the chest, abdomen and legs. The condition is severe. A woman, 72 years old, received a back injury, a traumatic amputation of the toes. Also, according to updated data from the head of Kherson OVA Oleksandra Prokudina, a 75-year-old woman who in the morning came under fire in Novodmitrivka, died in the hospital. As reported by ArmiyaInform, the shelling in Kherson region is not abating. One ​​more person died due to Russian aggression .

Title: In Kryvyi Rih, the rescue operation was completed: another body was unblocked from under the rubble
Description: This was reported by the State Emergency Service of Ukraine. In total, as a result of the Russian attack on the administrative building of the Kryvorizka District Police Department, 4 people were killed and 6 more people were injured. The search was completed at 12:00. 56 rescuers and 11 units of emergency services equipment were involved in the work. As said the head of Dnipropetrovsk OVA Serhiy Lysak, rescuers still remain at the site. The ruins of the police department, mutilated by the enemy, are being dismantled. Completed 90% of the work. 650 tons of construction debris were removed. -Unfortunately, we lost four people because of this attack. September 30 in the city is the Day of Mourning for the Dead,- noted Serhiy Lysak.

Title: Burn the witch! Near Vovchansk, the occupiers are fired directly at their positions
Description: The video of the combat work was published on the brigade's page. In addition to fire, paratroopers actively use kamikaze drones, which destroy enemy armored vehicles and personnel. -We see their shelters, we know their positions and destroy them mercilessly and precisely. Every explosion is our anger, every blow is revenge for our brothers. There is no safe place for those who come to our land with weapons. We are merciless, fearless and loyal... And we will win!-, the brigade commented on the video. As reported by ArmyInform, drones from the 82nd Airborne Assault Brigade showed how to destroy very inept Russians.

Title: The Armed Forces explained why the Russians are so interested in Vugledar, Kurakhovo and Pokrovsk
Description: This opinion was expressed by the head of the Council of Reservists of the Ground Forces of the Ukrainian Armed Forces Ivan Tymochko on the air of Suspilny September 28. -Populations there are located in such a way that if you try to occupy one of them, a specific one, there is a great chance for the Russian army to be hit by flanking strikes of Ukrainian artillery. Therefore, they are trying to level the line there and create a bridgehead in order to both push back the Armed Forces and develop coverage of the Donetsk region in the south, as well as create potential bridgeheads for an offensive on the mainland territory of Ukraine, in particular, in the direction of the Dnipropetrovsk region… We recall the KAB attacks on Zaporozhye, for example… All this should be considered within the framework of one operation,- says Ivan Tymochko. He emphasized that it is important for the enemy to capture Vugledar, which is an industrial mining town and was created only in the 60s of the 20th century. -It is heavily networked with railway tracks, there is a network of mines - and these are underground points for storing weapons and equipment, it stands at a height. It is important,- says Ivan Tymochko. Kurakhovo is a railway junction station, nearby is the Kurakhiv Reservoir, almost 40 km long. -That is, this is a line where they can build defenses and control the distribution of water to the nearest settlements,- argued the military man. Pokrovsk is a city on a ledge, to the side of the Kramatorsk-Slovyansk agglomeration. -This is the task before the Russian troops: to occupy the Donetsk region,- summarized Ivan Tymochko. As ArmyInform wrote, on September 26, fighters of the 72nd mechanized brigade named after the Black Zaporozhets recorded an appeal from the positions in Ugledar, in which they denied leaving the city.

Title: Without the Internet, but in a tie with a worker: -sovkovi - eagles - terns invaded Luhansk Region
Description: This was reported by Artem Lysogor, head of the Luhansk OVA. According to him, 8,998 children will wear images of workers of the occupied Luhansk region on their ties. A large number of them do not have Internet at home, are limited in using a mobile phone due to the blackout, and can only make a call from a wired one, if their parents have found the funds to install it. The occupation authorities did everything possible to make these boys and girls look for the future in the past. Yes, in four years, the September eagles will become pioneers, and in the 10th-11th grades - workers. Most of their parents at one time bypassed these Soviet customs, but chose this fate for their children. The number of advertisements for the sale of real estate has increased in the half-ruined Rubyzhny. Those who remained in the city, and those who went deep into the occupied territory or to the Russian Federation, do not see further life in this settlement. They are trying to redo the surviving apartment under Russian law and get rid of it. The enemy attacked the enemy, mostly in the Lyman direction. In Luhansk Region - in Grekivka, Makiivka and Balka Zhuravka districts. The situation there is complicated. The offensives of the occupiers are supported by artillery, such as in Makiivka and Balka Zhuravka. In the direction of this village, they struck five times with rocket salvo fire systems and directed 30 drones there. As reported by ArmyInform, in the Kharkiv direction Russian invaders focused on logistical support, replenishment of current losses and establishment of communication at advanced positions.

Title: The Armed Forces in Kurshchyna have opened new directions of strikes, but Russia is not interested i...

According to him, the Russian army will soon become more active in the south-eastern direction. -The enemy will prioritize the conduct of hostilities in the Vugledar, Kurakhovo, and Pokrovsky directions, ignoring the threats they pose in the Kursk region,- comments the head of the Council of Reservists of the Ground Forces of the Ukrainian Armed Forces. But, according to Ivan Tymochka, a situation no less related to the battle line is that our state received certain tranches of funds for the purchase of weapons from the allies, -This gives hope that the enemy will not be able to implement his strategy, at least on the coal- Kurakhiv direction,- summed up Ivan Tymochko. As ArmyInform wrote, fighters of the 22nd separate mechanized brigade of the Ground Forces zahysnyky-rozkryly-podrobyczi-boyiv-na-kurshhyni/->told how they managed to take 28 prisoners and destroy the DRG with one shot.

Title: Deterring the aggressor in the direction of the main strike: Oleksandr Syrskyi rewarded the paratroo...
Description: He wrote about this in his Telegram channel. He also thanked for their combat work, level of training, courage and resilience for our victory. -Soldiers, sergeants and officers of the brigade are effectively restraining the Russian aggressor in the direction of the enemy's main attack. Every day, in the area of ​​their responsibility, our defenders inflict tangible losses on the aggressor,- Oleksandr Syrskyi emphasized. So, this week alone, the soldiers of the Dovbush Brigade neutralized more than 500 occupiers, destroyed 2 tanks, 12 units of armored vehicles, 370 UAVs and a dozen other enemy vehicles. -I note your tenacity and professionalism on the battlefield. Thank you for the uncompromising fight for our freedom and independence!- - summed up the general. Title: Russia is at war with hospitals and civilians: the President reacted to Russia's attack on a medical...

We are doing our best to provide our people with the necessary assistance,- noted Volodymyr Zelenskyi. The president emphasized that everyone in the world who talks about this war should pay attention to where Russia is hitting. -They are at war with hospitals, civilian objects, people's lives. Only force can force Russia to make peace. Peace through strength is the only right way. Thank you to everyone who helps us along this path,- the head of state summed up. As reported by ArmyInform, 1 killed as a result of the first shelling person, the roof of several floors of the hospital was destroyed. Evacuation of patients and staff has begun. Rescuers and police officers arrived at the scene of the attack to help people. Then, during the evacuation of the sick, the enemy struck again.

Also, the enemy lost destroyed and damaged 73 units of weapons and military equipment, including: , in the Kharkiv direction, the Defense Forces destroyed 55 shelters for personnel, 5 ammunition storage locations and 2 UAV control points. Title: The enemy attacked a dense residential building in Dobropilly, seven people were injured
Description: The Donetsk Regional Prosecutor's Office reported this. -On September 28, 2024, at 02:05, Russian troops attacked the city of Dobropilla The center of the city with a dense residential development came under the blows of the enemy army. The means of destruction were aimed at multi-apartment and private buildings, where 7 townspeople suffered bodily injuries of varying degrees of severity in their homes,- the report says. Five men aged 30 to 79, the 72-year-old wife of one of them and another 65-year-old woman were taken to the hospital. They were diagnosed with explosive mine injuries, craniocerebral injuries, brain concussion, and stab wounds. According to law enforcement officers, in addition to residential buildings, some of which were engulfed in fire, the administrative building and garage were damaged. -The type of weapon used by the enemy for the attack is being established,- the prosecutor's office emphasized. A pre-trial investigation has been launched into the fact of violation of the laws and customs of war: ch. 1 Art. 438 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine. As ArmiyaInform wrote, on the morning of September 28 in Sumy the Russians hit the medical facility twice: as of now, 6 people have died.

Title: Distracting maneuver near the Tisza: border guards detained a whole family of -inventors-
Description: About informs the State Border Service of Ukraine. The clever people were discovered and detained thanks to the information provided in advance by the employees of the operative and investigative department. The men, two of whom are father and son, came to the city of Tyachiv allegedly for the purpose of tourism. In addition to visiting places of interest and highlights of the region, the -visit program- of the capital's guests included mandatory photography on the banks of the Tisza. According to the idea of ​​-tourists-, taking photos near the river would make it possible to assess the nature of the reservoir and determine the place of illegal border crossing. In order to lull the vigilance of the border guards, one of the men invited his wife to the photo session, the other invited his girlfriend. This -action- was constantly secretly observed by the border guard, and during the attempt to get closer to the river after taking pictures, they detained the -inventors-. Protocols on administrative offenses provided for in Art. 204-1 of the Criminal Procedure Code -Illegal crossing or attempted illegal crossing of the state border of Ukraine.- The cases are referred to the court. ArmyInform reminds that it is better not to break the law, but to use the aggregator of vacancies in the Armed Forces or recruiting centers.

Title: Debris from enemy drones damaged a fire station in the Kyiv region
Description: This is reported by Kyiv OVA. So far, debris from downed targets has been recorded in 4 districts. As a result of falling fragments of downed targets in one of the settlements, six private houses, a household and an administrative building were damaged. The damage is minor, windows are broken in the houses. In another area, the roof of a hangar of a private enterprise was damaged. Falling debris on the territory of the fire station was also detected. Several grass fires were recorded. All fires have been extinguished. Task forces continue to record the effects of the attack. As reported by ArmyInform, on the night of September 28 Kyiv has experienced yet another aerial attack by Russian drones, already the tenth since the beginning of the month.

Title: How the Ukrainian underground works during the occupation: details from the GUR
Description: About this an officer of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine told the Italian publication Il Foglio on condition of anonymity. According to him, Ukrainian partisans are behind this. It is known that occupiers and collaborators were killed and seriously wounded as a result of the explosions. According to the intelligence officer, every task carried out by the resistance movement is an incredible risk for a vigilante, but people still continue to help Ukraine - mostly for ideological and patriotic reasons. The underground also transmits important information about the movement of forces and resources of the aggressor state of Russia, which allows Ukraine to react in a timely manner - to strengthen defenses in the necessary areas of the front or to strike at concentrations of enemy troops and equipment. Sometimes unknown patriots of Ukraine paint symbolic graffiti on the streets of occupied cities - they exert psychological pressure on the enemy. -This is a signal to the occupiers that this is not their land. Our people are nearby, they have not given up their intentions to return their land,- said an employee of the Military Intelligence of Ukraine, his quotes GUR MOU in a telegram. Contrary to what many believe, the Ukrainian underground does not gather together to plan active activities. The curator of the resistance movement explained that agents can live in the same hallway and not know that both are working with Ukrainian intelligence. This is a necessary condition to ensure the safety of the underground, because the Russian special services do not stop hunting. -They act according to the principle: throw a stone at everyone and maybe hit a spy,- the Ukrainian intelligence officer said, adding that sometimes it is necessary to reduce the activity of underground people in order not to expose them to danger. Citizens of Russia, who in this way are fighting against Putin's criminal regime, also cooperate with GUR MOU. One of their activities is silent sabotage, for example, at enterprises of the military-industrial complex of the Russian Federation. -If a piece of military equipment is made incorrectly or a drawing is incorrectly made, it also brings some destructiveness,- the intelligence officer said. As reported by ArmyInform, the SSO Resistance movement reminded of itself in Crimea, returning the correct spelling to the city of Yevpatoria. This is despite the fact that the peninsula is allegedly completely controlled by the Russian -Ephesbeshniks-.

Title: Terrible consequences of shelling in the Kherson region: a man died, there are wounded

A 72-year-old man received non-life-threatening injuries. Sincere condolences to relatives and loved ones. Another person was injured. A 75-year-old woman has blast and brain injuries, as well as a traumatic leg amputation. The victim was taken to the hospital. She is under medical supervision. Also, in Khersonska ODA publicized the consequences of Russian shelling in one of the settlements of the Myliv community. Around seven in the morning, the occupiers struck the village from aviation. As a result of the strikes, private houses and farm buildings were destroyed and damaged. One person was injured. A 68-year-old woman was unblocked from under the rubble. She was hospitalized with mine-explosive and craniocerebral injuries, a broken leg, and a bruised chest. As reported by ArmyInform, among the almost 20 victims of Russian aggression in the Kherson region, there are two children.

Title: A moment of silence in Ukraine
Description: -In order to honor the bright memory, civic courage and self-sacrifice, strength of spirit, resilience and heroic deed of the soldiers who fell during the execution of combat missions to protect the state sovereignty and territorial integrity of Ukraine, civilians who died as a result of the armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine , I decree: to start holding a nationwide minute of silence every day at 9:00 a.m. for compatriots who died as a result of the armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine, to be announced in all mass media regardless of the form of ownership,- the document says.

Kostyantynivka, Berestok, Hirnyk, Trudove, Bogoyavlenka, Novodarivka, Zelene Pole, Lobkove, Novotimofiivka, Fedorivka, Temyrivka, Yasna Polyana, Kherson were also under attack. The terrorists used more than a dozen guided aerial bombs for airstrikes. In the Dnieper direction Russian invaders attacked our positions twice. They were repulsed and suffered losses. In the Volyn and Poliske directions no signs of the formation of enemy offensive groups were detected. We remind you that last day the losses of the Russian invaders amounted to 1470 people. Title: The enemy hit 8 populated areas of Zaporozhye 429 times per day

Title: The Russian army suffered another defeat: the defense forces stopped 170 enemy assaults
Description: This is reported by the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. The enemy carried out 66 airstrikes on the territory of Ukraine (using, in particular, more than 70 anti-aircraft missiles), and used 676 kamikaze drones to destroy them. He carried out more than 3,700 attacks on the positions of our troops and population centers. In the Kharkiv direction the enemy attacked six times near Vovchansk and Tikhoi. At the moment, there are 3 clashes. The situation is under control. On the Kupyansk direction the enemy tried 16 times to advance to our positions near Sinkivka, Novoselivka, Hlushkivka, Kruglyakivka, Kucherivka, and Lozova. Six enemy attacks were repulsed by the Defense Forces. The fighting continues. On the Lymansky direction the enemy attacked 14 times in the districts of Grekivka, Makiivka, Nevsky, Zarichny, Torsky and Novosadovo. Two skirmishes are still going on, the rest have been stopped by our soldiers. In the Kramatorsk direction, enemy activity resulted in nine combat engagements. All attacks near Hryhorivka, Predechyny, Chasovoy Yar, Bila Hora and Stupochky choked. The invaders suffered losses. In the Toretsk direction our troops repelled seven enemy attacks near Toretsk, Shcherbanivka and New York. All attacks were repelled by Ukrainian soldiers. The enemy tried 47 times to wedge into our defense on the Pokrovsky direction. The occupiers in the areas of the settlements of Vozdvizheneka, Novotoretskyi, Mykolaivka, Grodivka, Novogrodivka, Lysivka, Krutoy Yar, Dachinsky, Marynivka, Selidovoy and Novotoretskyi received a fierce rebuff from our defenders. Two attacks are ongoing. According to preliminary information, our soldiers neutralized more than 350 occupiers in this direction, 175 of them permanently. Five artillery systems, eleven armored combat vehicles, two BM-21 -Grad- and nine units of automobile equipment were destroyed. Eight vehicles of the occupiers, seven artillery systems, two tanks and three armored combat vehicles were also damaged. On the Kurakhiv direction the enemy attacked our positions 26 times. The most active was in the area of ​​Tsukuryny, Georgiyivka, Kostyantynivka and Katerynivka, where Ukrainian defenders repelled 23 attacks, three clashes are ongoing. In the Vremivsk direction our troops repelled 11 enemy attacks near Vugledar, Bogoyavlenka, Vodyanyi and Katerynivka. The occupiers unsuccessfully tried to launch three attacks on our positions on the Orihiv and Gulyajpil directions near Novodarivka, Robotyny and Maly Shcherbaki. They got a decent rebuff. In the Dnieper direction the enemy does not stop trying to knock our units out of their positions. Two unsuccessful attempts to storm the positions of Ukrainian soldiers were made by the aggressor during the day. Soldiers of the 35th separate marine infantry brigade named after Rear Admiral Mykhailo Ostrogradskyi and the 54th separate mechanized brigade named after Hetman Ivan Mazepa were awarded for effective and professional combat work in the department, who effectively destroy the enemy, inflicting significant losses in manpower and equipment. As reported by ArmyInform, the General Staff showed how Canadian instructors taktyczi-miskyh-boyiv/->teach Ukrainian military tactics of urban battles.

Title: - In Novohrodivka, they drove 15 meters to the shelter of the Russians. They all burned there. Siche...
Description: Correspondents of ArmiyaInform visited the waiting area of ​​Siecheslav tankers and talked with them about the combat tasks and tactics of the enemy. The crew of the T-80BV tank is on combat duty and is preparing for the mission. Enemy drones are flying around, explosions are periodically heard in nearby landings. — This is an offensive tank, it is designed for 5 minutes of combat — maneuverable, fast. He fires eight shots per minute. He flew in, gave a couple of good -slaps-, rolled back, recharged, and started again, - says the gunner-operator Vadim. He is the most experienced in the crew: he participated in the ATO since 2015, then returned to civilian life for a while. However, in 2021, he again signed a contract to serve in the Armed Forces. — Met a full-scale invasion in the East, then it was still a separate tank company, not a battalion. All my military life in the East. At the beginning, there were more crews, more motivated guys, - adds Vadim. Robert, a driver-mechanic, has been serving in the 25th Brigade of the Armed Forces of the Armed Forces for a year and a half, in civilian life he worked on construction sites. — At first, it was not very attractive to join the tankers, because tanks are mostly the first equipment destroyed. You drive along the highways, there are only towers, and you think: oh no, what tankers, - he recalls with a smile. Tank commander Vladyslav also served in the brigade for a year and a half. -As soon as we entered this direction, we destroyed two tanks with direct fire during the day, in the area of ​​the settlement of Karlivka,- he says. Vadim remembers his first combat encounter with the enemy at the beginning of a large-scale invasion near the village of Verkhnotoretske in the Donetsk region. - It was hell there. I was ready to face the enemy, but it was very difficult. We left with one tank, when the enemy had four. The enemy attacked very actively with the use of airplanes, -Grads-. In the early days, no one could believe that they had reached such a frenzy. It was difficult to come to terms with the fact that this is a real war, he says. One of the crew's most difficult tasks is to destroy an enemy shelter at close range. The building in which the Russians were hiding was located almost in the center of the city, surrounded by a lot of vegetation, so there was no other way to destroy it. — We had the worst situation in Novogrodivka. Our task was to go out and destroy the houses in which the Russians were hiding. Worked with the support of BMP. It was a very close distance - 15 meters, and after the shot nothing was visible, - says Vlad. He used to live in Novogrodivka, so he knew the area well - and this helped a lot in the task, since the tank drove in at dawn and it was difficult to navigate. In addition, there are many Russians around. — After the shots, everything burns, a lot of dust rises, the streets are narrow, it is impossible to turn the tower. And while rolling back, we passed a turn, and our BMP was driving behind us, which could not control itself and crashed. As a result, the crew climbed onto our tank from there. And we rolled back after pi***s. They understood everything, there was an interception that -the Khokhlyat tank was rolling,- recalls mechvod Robert. With the massive appearance of drones on the front, the tactics of using tanks have changed a lot. - Before there was a war - tanks against tanks, and now there are FPV drones. They can quickly find you and destroy the tank. Nowadays, tanks are used more from closed positions, says Vadim. It was the same at the beginning of the war, he recalls, because then the enemy had a significant advantage in technology. Tanks fired from closed firing positions to engage targets that were not in line of sight, and this was much more effective. The paratroopers say that the Russians are currently using an interesting tactic in the Pokrovsky direction — they move mainly on foot without the support of armored vehicles. - They value life force less than iron. And yet they end a little. If the enemy takes active actions, we are given a command, and we simply destroy them from a closed position. And it turns out very well, because the tank is a very precise thing, and it is advisable to use them in this way, - say the crew.   According to the observations of our tankers, the Russians currently use T-72 tanks the most in Donetsk region, newer tanks such as the T-90M -Breakthrough- are not recorded. — I saw a T-90 parked in Oskol. There was knee-deep water there, I don't know how he didn't pass there, couldn't cross the crossing, - says Vadim. In addition to domestic tanks, he can also drive German Leopards, as he has undergone the relevant training in Germany. — Foreign equipment is better equipped, it is good equipment, -reportazh-armiyainform-z-donechchyny/->especially Leopard 2A4 tanks. Its strengths are good weapons, an armored capsule, various electrical systems, the gunner notes. Tankers emphasize that the most important thing in the crew is harmony. Despite the fact that they have only been working together for a few months, the guys are confident in each other. - In a few months, we went through many funny stories. It brought us closer even before we were on the same crew. We were almost always next to each other, we worked together. -Coherence is very important,- emphasizes Robert. The Sicheslav brigade says that they are actively recruiting, and about 20 people have signed contracts this month. Everyone is accompanied from the first application to the beginning of the BZVP and until the person takes office. Photo by Olena Khudyakova

Title: Reactive response to enemy electronic countermeasures: the British created a drone that hunts for el...
Description: As indicate experts from the BuildingTech portal, the new UAV is developed on the basis of a proven jet drone Modini Dart 250, which ensured a high level of interchangeability of components and a high level of their availability, ArmyInform notes. The Dart 250EW is equipped with a set of modern sensors that allow it to hit WED complexes using a guidance system at the source of interference. The key element of this system is a dual-frequency antenna installation and the patented Modini FX-2 Flight controller. It is this controller that makes the drone capable of autonomous detection, capture and targeting of a target operating in the radio frequency range. The FX-2 Flight controller is responsible for managing all stages of the attack: from the initial detection of the source of radio waves to the precise destruction of the target. Such a system allows you to effectively suppress enemy EW, minimizing risks for operators and other combat units. Another important feature of the Dart 250EW is its Terrain following system, which allows the drone to automatically maintain a set flight height of 50 to 100 meters above ground level. It ensures the ability to covertly move the drone in difficult terrain conditions, which makes it difficult for enemy radar stations to detect. According to the contributors of the site mil.in.ua, the flight speed of the Dart 250EW presented on defense exhibition MSPO2024 in the Polish city of Kielce, exceeds 400 km/h. This makes it extremely maneuverable and hard to see for the enemy. Such a high speed allows the drone to quickly reach the area of ​​effect of enemy EW systems, guide and hit targets with minimal reaction time. When the Dart 250EW enters the area of ​​operation of an enemy EW system, its FX-2 Flight controller automatically guides itself to the source of interference by azimuth and altitude, ensuring an accurate hit on the target. This makes the drone a powerful means of suppressing enemy EW systems, effectively disrupting their operation and opening the way for further action by friendly forces. Therefore, the Dart 250EW is an innovative solution in the field of electronic warfare, combining high speed, maneuverability and accuracy of guidance, which makes it one of the key tools on the modern battlefield. The manufacturer expects a certain demand for drones of this type, since the war in Ukraine demonstrated the need for a large number of inexpensive means to defeat enemy electronic warfare systems. In addition, specialists of the Modini company are developing a reconnaissance variant of the jet drone under the index Dart 250 ISR.

Title: Remuneration for instructors of the Armed Forces: who is paid and how much
Description: ArmyInform tells who is entitled, under what conditions the payment is made, and how much military personnel in these positions receive. Military servicemen of the management and instructor-teaching staff of educational military units (educational centers, educational military units, educational units, training schools) are paid additional remuneration in the amount of from 15,000 to 30,000 hryvnias. The list of specific training military units and positions of management and instructor-teaching staff, which are paid additional remuneration, is determined by the decision of the Minister of Defense of Ukraine. Payment of the specified remuneration is made to servicemen who are involved in the training and training of personnel, from the day the training begins in the training military units until the day it is completed. Important. Additional compensation is paid regardless of the number of classes that conducted by the management and instructor-teaching staff during staff training. Military servicemen who are admitted to temporary performance of duties as instructors are also paid. And also to those who arrived on a business trip to training centers for training and training of personnel. The management and teaching staff are paid on the basis of the order of the commander of the military unit, and the commanders of the units are paid by the order of the superior commander according to their subordination. The preparation of draft orders on the involvement of instructors in training and the payment of additional compensation is carried out on the basis of the reports of unit commanders on the days of their actual implementation of staff training measures. They also require reporting documents on training. As reported in the Department of Social Security of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine, the reporting documents include: Payment will not be received by servicemen: a) who temporarily left the military unit with retention of positions at the place of service: b) in the event that persons holding positions (temporarily performing duties ranks by positions) of the instructor staff, do not have the corresponding level of training of the sergeant (sergeant) and instructor staff. c) in the following cases:

Title: The voice in the video does not belong to me: the enemy launched a deepfake about the situation in P...
Description: Back in February 2022, the Anti-Disinformation Center warned that technology deepfake can be actively used in information and psychological operations during the Russian invasion of Ukraine to create false videos. For example, with the statement about the capitulation of Volodymyr Zelenskyi. And there were actually a lot of deepfake videos during the large-scale war. The other day, the Head of the Donetsk regional state administration, head of the regional military administration, Vadym Filashkin notified that deepfake is spreading on the network a video with what appears to be his comment about the situation in the Pokrovsk community. The falsified video says that local residents are allegedly organizing rallies against the Armed Forces, clashing with the military, and therefore the community will be forced to evacuate the population. This information is not true. -The voice on the video does not belong to me, and the information presented repeats Russian propaganda narratives and is designed to cause tension in society,- said Vadym Filashkin and urged everyone to be careful with information on the Internet and trust only official sources. There are two main ways to protect against deepfakes: using critical thinking or technology. Again, artificial intelligence tools help to recognize a fake. But it is worth knowing that for more than a decade we have been living in the post-truth era, which is an information flow that is deliberately constructed in modern society to create a virtual reality different from reality with the goal of manipulating public consciousness. Therefore, a sensational message seen or heard during the war usually needs additional confirmation.

Title: Volodymyr Zelenskyi spoke about the results of his visit to the USA
Description: About this said President Volodymyr Zelenskyi before his departure for Ukraine. Strong positions for Ukraine mean faster peace. Everything that is key for Ukraine is on the partners' table, everything is being considered. Long-range, defense package, sanctions against Russia, steps regarding Russian assets. We managed to work on all topics,- said the President. He added that currently preparations are also underway for president-ssha/->meetings in Germany within the framework of -Ramstein- is a format where, together with partners, Ukraine will follow the contents of the points of the Victory Plan. -Thank you to President Biden for the invitation. Yesterday in Washington we went through all the key things, all the key decisions. Thank you for your desire to implement exactly this way so that Ukraine wins. Thanks for the unprecedented military package and corresponding decisions — a large package, the amount of almost 8 billion,- Volodymyr Zelenskyy said. According to him, the new aid package will support our soldiers and all our people, including the strengthening of air defense before winter. -There were meetings in the US Congress - full support. Both parties, both chambers. I am grateful to all senators, all members of the House of Representatives for conversations, for friendly advice and for questions that really make it possible to achieve important results, our common strength and peace through strength,- Volodymyr Zelenskyy said. He added that the Victory Plan was presented to both presidential candidates - Kamala Harris and /->Donald Trump. -It is important for Ukraine that America understands Ukraine directly. That's exactly how it is. This Russian war must be ended, and it must be ended justly, so that no aggressor does anything like Russia again,- said the President. Volodymyr Zelenskyy emphasized that everything dependent on Ukraine was done to strengthen it as much as possible. And now, together with our partners, we need to ensure exactly what will bring a just peace closer. Russia must lose this war. Ukraine must win. These are real foundations for common security. Peace is due to strength,- he said.

Title: 9 children and a 20-year-old boy were returned to Ukraine from Russia and the temporarily occupied t...
Description: reported the ombudsman Dmytro Lubinets about this. The age of the returnees is from 13 to 17 years. Some of them have disabilities and serious illnesses. Returned Ukrainians are from the Kherson, Zaporizhzhia, Donetsk, Luhansk regions and Crimea. At the beginning of the large-scale Russian invasion of Ukraine, some of the returned children were in the Oleshkiv Children's Boarding Home. Later, the occupation authorities took them to the city of Skadovsk and Russia. Through the mediation of the State of Qatar, it was possible to reunite the children with their families, who were separated for a long time by the Russians. One of the boys, who returned to his native land today, lost his father, who defended Ukraine during the Russian invasion. Some of the children will finally, after a long time, hug their relatives who are faithfully serving in various structures of Ukraine. Some returned to their grandparents, because they are the ones who can give a happy childhood in their native land.

Title: The General Staff showed how Canadian instructors teach Ukrainian military tactics in urban battles
Description: Photos from the training of Ukrainian servicemen -in urban areas- were made public in the General headquarters of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. During the exercise, service members practice tactical elements such as house and room entry checks, casualty evacuation, preparation, capture, clearing and building maintenance, and more. Also, the Ukrainian military learns complex actions during the seizure of premises in the department. Important importance is given to the skills of moving among city ruins, overcoming rubble, moving between buildings, etc. Instructors emphasize that fighting can take place in one building and consist of several isolated battles and skirmishes on different floors, in different corridors and rooms. These training modules prepare our soldiers for combat conditions during the defense of Ukraine against the Russian aggressor. Canadian instructors play a key role in this process, providing a high level of training and imparting their expertise. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that Ukrainian soldiers are trained by Norwegian instructors of the Norwegian training operation -ELLISEV-, which is a component of the multinational training operation Interflex on the territory of Great Britain.

Title: Dmytro Klimenkov: An effective and transparent defense procurement system is a key priority
Description: Deputy Minister of Defense Dmytro Klimenkov said about this. -The team of the Ministry of Defense is working on its improvement every day. We are grateful to our NATO partners for their constant and constructive cooperation, in particular within the framework of the Strategic Review of Defense Procurement,- he said. The MOU plans to involve the teams of the Ministry of Justice of Ukraine, the Ministry of Foreign Affairs and our international partners with NATO in active cooperation in the implementation of the recommendations of the Review and their practical implementation. -An effective procurement system is a guarantee of timely provision of our soldiers with everything they need at the front, and this is one of the key elements of our future victory,- Dmytro Klimenkov emphasized.

Title: Volodymyr Zelensky presented the Victory Plan to Donald Trump
Description: This is stated in messages of the head of state. -I think we have a common view that the war in Ukraine should be stopped. Putin cannot win. Ukrainians must win. And I want to discuss with you the details of our plan, the Victory Plan,- the head of state said before the start of the meeting. Volodymyr Zelenskyi noted that it is necessary to put pressure on the Russian dictator and force him to make peace, and presented Donald Trump with the Victory Plan. The President of Ukraine also talked about the situation at the front, the progress of the operation in the Kursk region and its tasks, Ukrainian innovations in the fight against Russian terror, as well as the disproportionately high losses of the Russian army. During the meeting, the general situation in Ukraine, the consequences of the war for Ukrainians and the economy were discussed in detail. A separate focus of the conversation is the constant shelling of cities and civilian infrastructure by the Russian Federation and the role of American Patriot systems in protecting people's lives. Volodymyr Zelenskyi also emphasized that it is necessary to block any opportunities for the aggressor state to receive money for the war from the sale of oil and gas, as well as all channels of supply of Western components for Russian missiles. Donald Trump called today's meeting a good sign. -He (the President of Ukraine, — ed.) went through hell, and his country went through such hell, which few countries have gone through - this has never happened anywhere. No one had ever seen anything like it. It's a terrible situation,- he said. As you know, during his visit to the USA, Volodymyr Zelensky also ocholyt-prezydent-ssha/->held a meeting with US President Joe Biden and Democratic presidential candidate Camila Harris.

Title: The Defense Forces explained the activation of the Russians in the Lyman direction
Description: The head of the public relations service told about this on Army TV 63 OMBr Rostislav Yashchyshyn. -There is a whole set of reasons here. We know that they are conducting a certain covert mobilization, new personnel are constantly arriving. They go through minimal training for a few days, no one bothers with them,- said Rostyslav Yashchyshyn. The spokesman added that the occupiers had also been accumulating equipment for a long time, and when they managed to collect the amount necessary for the assaults, they used it. -But such assaults did not bring any positives for the enemy. Our main task, first of all, is to prevent armored vehicles from approaching our infantry. That is why we launch counterattacks at the beginning of the offensive,- he explained. According to the information of the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, on September 27 in the Limansk direction, the invading army kurahivskomu-ta-pokrovskomu-napryamkah/->carried out six attacks on Ukrainian positions near Grekivka, Makiivka, Nevsky and Novosadovo. Four clashes have ended, two more are ongoing.

Title: During the day, the occupiers shelled Kherson, there are wounded
Description: This was notified by the Kherson Regional State Administration. A 58-year-old man and an 82-year-old woman were injured as a result of dropping explosives. They have blast injuries, contusions and shrapnel wounds to the head. -Shvidka- took the victims to the hospital for medical assistance. Two women injured in another Russian shelling of Kherson were also taken to the hospital. At the time of the enemy attack, local women, 85 and 64 years old, were in the house. They received explosive injuries and contusions. Earlier today, a man from Kherson was taken to the hospital, who was injured in a Russian attack on the Dnipro district of Kherson. A 53-year-old man was injured due to an attack by an enemy UAV. As reported by ArmyInform, removed the bodies of two more dead. The number of dead has increased to three.

Title: Ukrainian brush, but with foreign details - the fighter Vasyl gets used to the prosthesis of his rig...
Description: The video with the defender was published on September 27 on the brigade channel . Vasyl served as a driver. Having lost a limb during enemy fire, he did not leave his service in the army and his comrades. Even with one hand, the boy drove the car perfectly and did not lose heart. -I also drove with an automatic transmission. But I got used to mechanics. I think it's pretty good,- says Vasyl. Now Vasyl is getting used to the bionic arm. -It performs certain functions, helps in everyday life,- says the fighter. The 63rd brigade expresses its sincere gratitude to all volunteers and medics who helped and supported our indomitable soldiers. As reported by ArmyInform, veterans on prostheses participated in the show at Ukrainian Fashion Week.

Title: New ponchos for the Armed Forces: the Ministry of Defense invites companies to participate in tests
Description: This is stated in the message at sites of the department. Ukrainian poncho manufacturers can offer samples of their products in accordance with the technical conditions developed by the Ministry of Defense. -Technical description for the experimental batch - Poncho (Type 2)- from the Main Directorate for the Development of Material Support is already available on the official website of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine in the section -Technical descriptions for the experimental batch-, as well as on the platform -MOU Partner-‎. As reported by ArmyInform, the Ministry of Defense plans to expand the range of tangible property for the military. The department is developing technical specifications for baseball caps, pants with knee pads, turnstiles and tablets.

Title: 68,000 women in the Armed Forces: the Ministry of Defense managed to implement systemic changes in g...
Description: About this said State Secretary of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine Lyudmila Daragan at the international seminar on gender equality, which was held as part of the annual Richelieu Forum of Public Service in Kyiv. She said that the total number of women in the Armed Forces of Ukraine is 68,000, of which more than 48,000 are servicewomen. There are about 5,000 servicewomen directly in the combat zone. Lyudmila Daragan shared her observations of the faster integration of women in the army in the conditions of repelling a large-scale Russian invasion: -Today, women are everywhere - holding the rear, working in difficult positions, fighting in the ranks of the Armed Forces. They prove that people should be judged by their capabilities, efficiency and intelligence, not by gender.- The State Secretary of the Ministry of Defense drew attention to the changes in the gender policy of the Ministry of Defense, which were implemented in recent years. In particular, based on her own experience of serving, she noted that in 2018, women had the opportunity to serve in combat specialties. However, this opportunity remained unrealized for a long time. -The law itself was not enough. There was also an order with the seal of the DSK, which regulated officer positions for women and men separately. In 2022, after the change of this order, it was possible to overcome these obstacles,- Lyudmila Daragan said. In addition, it was possible to improve the level of material security of female military personnel. For example, in 2023, the summer women's military uniform appeared - before that, only the dress uniform was available. The participants of the seminar discussed topical issues of ensuring equality and inclusion in the context of the state policy of Ukraine. Special attention was paid to the impact of the war on overcoming gender inequality in the public service and the Armed Forces. The event emphasized the importance of implementing people-centered principles. They also discussed the new challenges that Ukraine faced due to the full-scale war: The participants noted Ukraine's significant progress in achieving gender equality and adapting legislation to European standards.
